fd_greens.main.molecular_hamiltonian module

Molecular Hamiltonian.

class fd_greens.main.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian(geometry: List[Tuple[str, Sequence[Union[int, float]]]], basis: str, multiplicity: int = 1, charge: int = 0, name: Optional[str] = None, run_pyscf_options: dict = {}, occ_inds: Optional[Sequence[int]] = None, act_inds: Optional[Sequence[int]] = None, build_ops: bool = True)

Bases: object

A class to store a molecular Hamiltonian.

build(build_openfermion_op: bool = True, build_qiskit_op: bool = True) → None

Constructs both the Openfermion and the Qiskit qubit operators.

Parameters

  • build_openfermion_op – Whether to build the Openfermion qubit operator.

  • build_qiskit_op – Whether to build the Qiskit qubit operator.

property openfermion_op: openfermion.ops.operators.qubit_operator.QubitOperator

Returns the Openfermion qubit operator.

property qiskit_op: qiskit.opflow.primitive_ops.pauli_sum_op.PauliSumOp

Returns the Qiskit qubit operator.

to_array(array_type: str = 'ndarray') → numpy.ndarray

Converts the molecular Hamiltonian to an array form.

Parameters

array. (A string indicating the type of the output) –
